case.title: looking for a good irishman - 60 (queens)
case.text: bettween 50-60 no kids no codgers with a car any kind at least 5'7 I am 5'10 medium weight I need to lose a few pounds as well good sense of humour employed mandatory white mandatory born here or there prefer irish but that is not mandatory I am French,english and irish born here should be comfortable in a pub but not live in one I go out on the weekend must love animals divorced widowed single a keeper not a flyby I like tv,movies,theater,museums,reading,parks,zoos open to suggestions I am 60 but seem much younger my children are long grown must be clean shaven non smoker I gave it up 2 years ago
